title: Unexpected when Connection File is in an unmapped Network Drive
author: app/
body_snippet:
## Expected Behavior
When chosing connection file from prompt dialog changes to that file should be written to the same location I chose the file from.

## Current Behavior
mRemoteNG tries to load a file from e.g. Z:\. It doesn't find it and asks for another or a new config file. Chose the new lcoation of the config file. It opens but changes will be written to the old location

## Possible Solution
New connections file default location does not get written to config file after chosing ne...
